ratings.name: Early Childhood
ratings.description: Content is intended for young children.

ratings.name: Everyone
ratings.description: Content is generally suitable for all ages. May contain minimal cartoon, fantasy or mild violence and/or infrequent use of mild language.

ratings.name: Everyone 10+
ratings.description: Content is generally suitable for ages 10 and up. May contain more cartoon, fantasy or mild violence, mild language and/or minimal suggestive themes.

ratings.name: Teen
ratings.description: Content is generally suitable for ages 13 and up. May contain violence, suggestive themes, crude humor, minimal blood, simulated gambling and/or infrequent use of strong language.

ratings.name: Mature
ratings.description: Content is generally suitable for ages 17 and up. May contain intense violence, blood and gore, sexual content and/or strong language.

ratings.name: Adults Only
ratings.description: Content suitable only for adults ages 18 and up. May include prolonged scenes of intense violence, graphic sexual content and/or gambling with real currency.

ratings.name: Rating Pending
ratings.description: Not yet assigned a final ESRB rating. Appears only in advertising, marketing and promotional materials related to a game that is expected to carry an ESRB rating, and should be replaced by a game's rating once it has been assigned.

descriptors.name: Alcohol Reference
descriptors.description: Reference to and/or images of alcoholic beverages

descriptors.name: Animated Blood
descriptors.description: Discolored and/or unrealistic depictions of blood

descriptors.name: Blood
descriptors.description: Depictions of blood

descriptors.name: Blood and Gore
descriptors.description: Depictions of blood or the mutilation of body parts

descriptors.name: Cartoon Violence
descriptors.description: Violent actions involving cartoon-like situations and characters. May include violence where a character is unharmed after the action has been inflicted

descriptors.name: Comic Mischief
descriptors.description: Depictions or dialogue involving slapstick or suggestive humor

descriptors.name: Crude Humor
descriptors.description: Depictions or dialogue involving vulgar antics, including "bathroom" humor

descriptors.name: Drug Reference
descriptors.description: Reference to and/or images of illegal drugs

descriptors.name: Fantasy Violence
descriptors.description: Violent actions of a fantasy nature, involving human or non-human characters in situations easily distinguishable from real life

descriptors.name: Intense Violence
descriptors.description: Graphic and realistic-looking depictions of physical conflict. May involve extreme and/or realistic blood, gore, weapons and depictions of human injury and death

descriptors.name: Language
descriptors.description: Mild to moderate use of profanity

descriptors.name: Lyrics
descriptors.description: Mild references to profanity, sexuality, violence, alcohol or drug use in music

descriptors.name: Mature Humor
descriptors.description: Depictions or dialogue involving "adult" humor, including sexual references

descriptors.name: Nudity
descriptors.description: Graphic or prolonged depictions of nudity

descriptors.name: Partial Nudity
descriptors.description: Brief and/or mild depictions of nudity

descriptors.name: Real Gambling
descriptors.description: Player can gamble, including betting or wagering real cash or currency

descriptors.name: Sexual Content
descriptors.description: Non-explicit depictions of sexual behavior, possibly including partial nudity

descriptors.name: Sexual Themes
descriptors.description: References to sex or sexuality

descriptors.name: Sexual Violence
descriptors.description: Depictions of rape or other violent sexual acts

descriptors.name: Simulated Gambling
descriptors.description: Player can gamble without betting or wagering real cash or currency

descriptors.name: Strong Language
descriptors.description: Explicit and/or frequent use of profanity

descriptors.name: Strong Lyrics
descriptors.description: Explicit and/or frequent references to profanity, sex, violence, alcohol or drug use in music

descriptors.name: Strong Sexual Content
descriptors.description: Explicit and/or frequent depictions of sexual behavior, possibly including nudity

descriptors.name: Suggestive Themes
descriptors.description: Mild provocative references or materials

descriptors.name: Tobacco Reference
descriptors.description: Reference to and/or images of tobacco products

descriptors.name: Use of Alcohol
descriptors.description: The consumption of alcoholic beverages

descriptors.name: Use of Drugs
descriptors.description: The consumption or use of illegal drugs

descriptors.name: Use of Tobacco
descriptors.description: The consumption of tobacco products

descriptors.name: Violence
descriptors.description: Scenes involving aggressive conflict. May contain bloodless dismemberment

descriptors.name: Violent References
descriptors.description: References to violent acts

ratings.description: Suitable for ages 3 and older. May contain very mild violence in an appropriate context for younger children, but neither bad language nor frightening content is allowed.
Suitable for ages 7 and older. May contain mild or unrealistic violence (e.g. violence in a cartoon context), or elements that can be frightening to younger children.
Suitable for ages 12 and older. May contain violence in either a fantasy context or a sporting action, profanity, mild sexual references or innuendo, or gambling.
Suitable for ages 16 and older. May contain explicit or realistic-looking violence, strong language, sexual references or content, gambling, or encouragement of drug use.

Unsuitable for persons under 18. May contain graphic violence, including "violence towards defenceless people" and "multiple, motiveless killing", strong language, strong sexual content, gambling, drug glamorisation, or discrimination.

descriptors.name: Violence
descriptors.description: May contain scenes of people getting injured or dying, often by use of weapons, whether realistically or in a fantastical or cartoonish manner. May also contain gore and blood-letting.

descriptors.name: Bad Language
descriptors.description: May contain profanity, sexual innuendo, threats, and all manner of slurs, insults, and epithets.

descriptors.name: Fear
descriptors.description: May contain scenes and plot elements too disturbing or frightening to younger players.

descriptors.name: Sex
descriptors.description: May contain references to sexual attraction or sexual intercourse. May also contain nudity and characters dressed in suggestive clothing.

descriptors.name: Drugs
descriptors.description: May contain references to illegal drugs or a fictional substance that has parallels to real-life illegal drugs (in use, possession, or sale).

descriptors.name: Gambling
descriptors.description: May contain elements that encourage or teach gambling.

descriptors.name: Discrimination
descriptors.description: May contain scenes or references to cruelty or harassment based on race, religion, ethnicity, gender, ability, or sexual preferences.

descriptors.name: Online
descriptors.description: Contains an online game mode.
